Reviews.Title: Not Smart enough to be 3D......
Reviews.Author: L. Robinson
Reviews.Content: Unless I am missing something I don't understand why this TV is being advertised as a smart/3d tv because it's neither. I am so disappointed and frustrated because it would have been perfect for my son's room.  He has been asking me for a 3d tv for a couple of years now for Christmas and I finally found one that I thought was ideal. Amazon please change the description on this item or explain to be what makes it a smart or 3d tv since it's not listed on the box. Furthermore, after thinking I was crazy I goggled this item on other sites to find that 3d/smart isn't even mentioned in their description. It's being advertised as a LED television....that's it!!!!!PS...I am giving it 3 stars because it seems like it would have been a nice set if that's what I was in the market for!
